content.p: The Nottingham Advantage Award is designed to give formal recognition to students taking part in activities outside their academic study, and is intended to increase their employability and add value to their overall experience at University of Nottingham Malaysia. Students must demonstrate significant achievement by undertaking a range of activities which could include volunteering, work experience and career planning.
